Question
========
When describing the motion of an object, distance is

Answerlist
----------
* the direction in which the object moves.
* the scalar of the object's velocity.
* how far the object ends up relative to its starting position.
* the amount of ground covered by the moving object.

Solution
========
Distance is a scalar that describes the amount of ground which is covered by the moving object.
